title: Bloomberg Markets: Soper on Trump vs. Amazon, Wang on Jawbone
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Soper on Trump vs. Amazon, Wang on Jawbone
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Spencer Soper Technology and E-Commerce Reporter Bloomberg News DiscussingPresident Donald Trump once again unloaded on Amazon.com Inc., tweeting that the company is hurting other retailers and implying that it’s killing industry jobs across the U.S. Selina Wang Global Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing her story on Jawbone's high-risk plan to become a medical device maker.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
